constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 153 (Thursday, September 22, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GOHMERT:
H.R. 8961.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Section 1 of the 10th Amendment to the Consitution
[Page H8114]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: To abolish the Department of Education and to provide funding directly to States for elementary and secondary education, and for other purposes.
